mapper.insert: insert into userreportrecord (bUserId, bReportUserId, vReportDetail, dReportTime) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reportUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reportDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select bReportId, bUserId, bReportUserId, vReportDetail, dReportTime from userreportrecord
